docs.title: FFMVic Open Tech Docs
docs.text:
This website contains generic technical documentation and implementation guides. Below is a list of the currently available documentation.

  • The new eMap Platform →

    Full Implementation Guidelines for Deploying ArcGIS Enterprise 11.4 on Azure using Cloud-native technologies. Covers architecture, data governance, and operational procedures.

docs.title: About This Site
docs.text: This site hosts generic technical documentation and implementation guides produced by the Department of Energy, Environment and Climate Action (DEECA) for Forest Fire Management Victoria (FFMVic).

docs.title: ArcGIS Enterprise 11.4 on Azure: Implementation Plan (eMap 2.0)
